subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Checks alignment of leading asterisks in block comments and javadocs. If asterisks is not aligned properly or if there are consecutive asterisks then it will produce violation. If no asterisks is used then that line will be ignored.

tr.td: Sets the alignment direction of the asterisk.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: To configure the check for asterisk to be aligned in right side.

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
